channel.title: Suggestion: Reputation System Change
channel.description:
1. After looking at the recent Reputation abuse, I think that each person can only use the [rep++] function 5 or 10 times in a month. This will dramatically reduce all chances of autoing the reputation function or just plain out massive repping.
2. I know this one will not go as far, but I think that all members should indeed start at 0 reputation instead of 10. This way, even someone with 200 reputation (maximum) can rep a 13 but still not make the user able to rep others. This means that all members (except cms and mods) should be reduced by 10 reputation. I am not asking for a reset, just a reduction.
Note: If anyone here starts complaining about this being posted or about loosing rep, I suggest you do not post at all.

item.title: Suggestion: Reputation System Change
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

I agree rep causes problems. But it shouldn’t. Its basically nothing but a number. People shouldn’t obess over it. Its sad people add you on MSN and then tell them to rep you…I just look at it as a game…

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Reputation System Change
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“t3h 0wn4g3, post:103, topic:97237”]get rid of rep and make it so admins and mods have to make cms, and cms can recomend people for becoming one
thats what i say:)[/quote]
That’s what i said.
But, yes, i agree.

[quote=“shadow235, post:104, topic:97237”][quote author=t3h 0wn4g3 link=topic=139948.msg1405250#msg1405250 date=1180636160]
get rid of rep and make it so admins and mods have to make cms, and cms can recomend people for becoming one
thats what i say:)
[/quote]I partly agree.

The only issue with changing it again is: People will complain. You’ve done it once and again would be horror. But I guess this community can take a hit. What do y’all think?[/quote]
But, if we get rid of rep altogether they have no reason to complain, really.
“Bring rep back because… uhh… It causes trouble!”

Read full topic

I am fine at how it is.
[/quote]

Just call it “Points.”

-Alexia

lel i got 17 dildos wanna buy one?
